named-query.name: rental.maxDayId
named-query.query: SELECT MAX (r.dayId) FROM RentalEntity r WHERE r.day = :day

named-query.name: rental.getByDayId
named-query.query: FROM RentalEntity r WHERE r.dayId = :dayId AND r.day = :day

named-query.name: rental.getBetweenDate
named-query.query: FROM RentalEntity r WHERE r.day BETWEEN :start AND :end ORDER BY r.id

named-query.name: rental.getAllActive
named-query.query: FROM RentalEntity r WHERE r.day = :day AND (r.deleted = FALSE OR r.deleted IS NULL) and (r.finished = FALSE OR r.finished IS NULL)
